title: Owner Registration and Organization Creation
description: Verify that a new owner can register successfully, create an organization, and set up the initial branch.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Fill out the registration form with valid owner credentials.
Submit the registration form.
Confirm account creation and successful login.
Create a new organization with required details.
Verify the organization is created and stored in the database.
Create the first branch (sucursal) for the organization.
Confirm branch creation and availability in branch selection.

title: Employee Invitation and Magic Link Registration
description: Validate that owners can invite employees and employees can register via magic link invitation successfully.

steps.description: Owner navigates to employee invitation page.
Owner sends an invitation by entering employee email.
Verify invitation record is created in pending_invites.
Employee receives magic link via email and clicks the link.
Employee completes profile setup, including selecting branch.
Verify employee account is created with proper role and branch access.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that owners and employees have access only to their permitted routes and features.

steps.description: Login as owner user.
Access all owner-specific pages such as dashboard, product management, supplier management.
Attempt to access employee-only pages.
Confirm owner can access employee pages or restrict as designed.
Logout and login as employee user.
Confirm access to employee dashboard, POS system, and missions.
Attempt to access owner-only pages.
Verify access is denied or redirected appropriately.

title: Product CRUD Operations with Barcode Scanning
description: Confirm ability to create, read, update, and delete products including barcode input and category assignment.

steps.description: Navigate to product creation page.
Add product details including name, price, cost, category, and scan barcode.
Save the product.
Verify product is stored and displayed correctly.
Edit product details and save changes.
Check updated details are saved and correctly reflected.
Delete the product.
Verify product is removed from the database and listings.

title: Inventory Management: Stock Inflows, Outflows, and Critical Stock Alerts
description: Validate stock addition, reduction after sales, expiration tracking, and triggering of critical stock alerts.

steps.description: Add stock to a product via the inventory management interface.
Confirm stock quantity updates correctly.
Simulate sales that decrement stock of the product.
Ensure stock quantity decreases accordingly.
Enter expiration dates for stock batches.
Verify expiration tracking shows upcoming and expired stock.
Reduce stock to below critical threshold.
Check that critical stock alert and Happy Hour discount trigger.

title: Complete POS Transaction with Multiple Payment Methods
description: Ensure that sales can be processed through POS with barcode scanning, multiple payment options, and stock update.

steps.description: Navigate to POS/cash register page.
Scan product barcode(s) to add them to the cart.
Confirm product and price are correctly added.
Select different payment methods (cash, card, digital).
Complete the sale transaction.
Verify stock quantities are updated to reflect the sale.
Check that transaction details are recorded in daily cash register.

title: Daily Cash Register Operations and Reconciliation
description: Test opening the cash register, registering sales and money movements, closing the register, and performing cash reconciliation.

steps.description: Open the daily cash register with initial amount.
Confirm cash register status updated to open.
Perform sales using POS and record additional money movements (incomes/expenses).
Check that all movements are logged and totals calculated.
Close the cash register at end of day.
Conduct cash count and reconcile differences if exist.
Verify cash reconciliation reports and audit trail are accurate.

title: Supplier Management and Purchase Logging
description: Validate creation and update of supplier records, purchase registration, and control of supplier balances.

steps.description: Create a new supplier with required details.
Verify supplier appears in supplier list.
Register a new purchase from the supplier including products and quantities.
Confirm purchase is linked to supplier and stock is updated.
Check that supplier balance reflects purchases and payments.
Validate balance control and updates on payments.

title: Multi-branch Setup and Data Segregation with RLS
description: Ensure multiple branches can be managed independently with data segregation enforced via Row Level Security.

steps.description: Create multiple branches within an organization.
Verify branches are listed and selectable.
Assign products, stock, and employees to specific branches.
Login as employee with access to only one branch.
Confirm visibility only to branch-specific data (stock, sales, products).
Attempt to access data of other branches.
Verify access is denied due to RLS policies.

title: Gamified Employee Missions and Experience Tracking
description: Test assignment of missions to employees, gain of XP/points, and appearance in rankings.

steps.description: Assign a mission to an employee from owner dashboard.
Verify mission is assigned and visible to employee.
Employee completes mission and updates status.
Check XP and points are increased accordingly.
Navigate to team ranking page.
Validate employee ranking reflects updated XP and points.

title: Employee Attendance Clock-In and Clock-Out
description: Verify employees can record attendance entries and exits with time stamps.

steps.description: Employee navigates to attendance control page.
Click clock-in button to record start of workday.
Confirm attendance entry created with accurate timestamp.
Click clock-out button to record end of workday.
Verify clock-out timestamp is recorded and attendance session is complete.

title: Additional Services: SUBE Card Recharge
description: Test functionality for adding funds to public transport SUBE cards through the system.

steps.description: Navigate to SUBE recharge widget.
Enter valid SUBE card number and recharge amount.
Submit recharge request.
Verify recharge confirmation and transaction record.

title: Automatic Happy Hour Discount Application for Critical Stock Products
description: Validate that products with critical stock levels automatically receive Happy Hour discounts during sales.

steps.description: Reduce product stock to critical level.
Confirm product is flagged for Happy Hour discount.
Process a sale including critical stock product.
Check that discounted price is applied automatically.

title: User Interface Accessibility and Responsiveness
description: Ensure all UI components comply with accessibility standards and function correctly on various device sizes.

steps.description: Open key interface pages (login, dashboards, product management) on desktop screen.
Verify components are keyboard-navigable and have proper ARIA attributes.
Resize browser to tablet and mobile screen sizes.
Check UI responsiveness and proper layout adjustment.
Use screen reader to navigate key pages.
Confirm important content is announced and accessible.

title: Error Handling: Invalid Login Attempts
description: Verify system response to invalid login credentials and account lockout scenarios.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter wrong email and/or password.
Attempt login.
Verify error message indicates invalid credentials.
Repeat invalid login attempts exceeding limit.
Confirm account lock or rate limiting triggers.

title: Error Handling: Stock Addition with Invalid Data
description: Ensure system validates stock inputs and handles errors for invalid or missing fields.

steps.description: Navigate to stock addition page.
Attempt to add stock with negative quantity.
Verify validation error is shown preventing submission.
Omit required fields like product or expiration date.
Check required field error messages appear.
